entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
